plot: Melinda helps a professor whose actions are why she's being haunted, and Jim considers a new career.

Professor Rick Payne wonders why his photography colleague Claudia Pollili's image disappears from pictures. It seems the work of the ghost of her late student lover Kevin Graham. But the story is more complicated, involving Kevin's own admirer Sophie Owens. Meanwhile Jim Clancy makes up his mind whether to start med school after witnessing an ER doctor making a fatally wrong diagnosis against his advice.—KGF Vissers
